dmca.title: Adkad Requests Takedown of Sites Allegedly Offering Cracks in Groundskeeper Pro, othe
dmca.body:
Sunday, January 30, 2005
ADKAD TECHNOLOGIES
[Private]
WWW.ADKAD.COM

Google Inc
Attn: User Support, DMCA Complaints
[Private]

Google:

1.	Adkad Technologies, Inc has the exclusive rights under copyright law to distribute the following software products~ GroundsKeeper Lite, GroundsKeeper Pro and Blizzard Buster. The copyrighted software is available at the corporation's website that appears at the following URL: http://www.adkad.com. Adkad Technologies Inc developed and wrote the software and is the only company with rights to sell the software.
2.	Utilizing the search queries outlined below at www.google.com, the following search results contain unauthorized distribution of registration numbers that unlock our software for illegal use.

Search Query: GroundsKeeper Pro 
Infringing WebPages: www.seriall.com/key/groundskeeper_pro 2000_5_00_1.html
www.crackz-serialz.com/list/g/20 
www.serials.ws/all/?l=G&pn=4 
serials.thebugs.ws/pages/G/9.shtml
www.andr.net/sn/?l=g&pn=5 
www.serialz.to/G/7.htm 
www.trinsic.org/index.php?browse=G&num=68 
mscracks.com/cracks/G8.php
usuarios.lycos.es/proyectoka0z/serials/sn-g2.php
www.aztechsystems.co.uk/heterogenous-homogenous-mixture.html www.trinsic.org/index.php?browse=A&num=102
www.serialheaven.com/namelist/a8.html
www.hitprom.com/software/soft-g1.php
serials.thebugs.ws/pages/A/12.shtml
www.easycracks.net/g11.html
www.andr.net/sn/?l=a&pn=7 
www.crack.dragon.net.ru/gl4.htm 
www.crack-cd.com/g.15.html 
www.serialspot.com/sitemap/serialsG.php

Search Query: GroundsKeeper Lite 
Infringing WebPages: mscracks.com/cracks/G8.php
www.cracksearch.ru/cracks/g4.html
www.serialspot.com/sitemap/serialsG.php

Search Query: Blizzard Buster 
Infringing WebPages: www.trinsic.org/index.php?browse=B&num=78 www.easycracks.net/b12.html 
www.trinsic.org/index.php?browse=A&num=102
www.serialz.to/B/8-htm
www-seriall.com/b/9.html
www.easycracks.net/a15.html

Search Query: Adkad Technologies 
Infringing WebPages: www.trinsic.org/index.php?browse=A&num=102
www.seriall.com/a/11.html 
www.thekeys.ws/list/serials-a8.html

3,	Adkad Technologies Inc may be contacted on this matter at [private]@adkad.com or [private].
4.	We do not know how to contact the owner or owners of the websites that contain the infringing material since they do not provide contact information on their sites. Due to the criminal nature of their websites it is no doubt on purpose that they do not want to be known. A word of warning: in addition to giving away our software registration numbers and thousands of other software title serial numbers/unlock codes, the infringing sites contain adult material and many viruses.
5.	The use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing webpage's is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.
6.	I swear, under penalty of perjury consistent with United States Code Title 17, Section 512, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

Regards,
[private]
President
Adkad Technologies, Inc.
www.adkad.com
[private]
